definition: to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: The press employs all the steel- sheet welded structure frame, featuring good appearance and excellent rigidity.
sentences.chinese: 本机全部采用钢板焊接结构，外形美观，刚度高。

sentences.english: Measurement of stiffness during simulated spinal physiotherapy.
sentences.chinese: 刚度测量中模拟脊椎物理治疗。

sentences.english: In addition, the set of girder camber could increase structure's rigidity.
sentences.chinese: 预拱度的设置可以提高结构的刚度。

sentences.english: This paper mainly introduces the incorporate stiffness and deformation of the cyl inder block.
sentences.chinese: 本文重点研究了机体整体刚度和变形。

sentences.english: The effect of clamping distribution is an important factor in low-rigidity structure part deformation.
sentences.chinese: 装夹布局是弱刚度结构件加工变形的重要影响因素。

sentences.english: The constant shear strain point accounting for the degradation of stiffness was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 对考虑刚度劣化时的常剪切应变点进行了讨论。

sentences.english: In this article, the author discussed the strength and rigidity of the skull bones from the view of mechanics and bionics.
sentences.chinese: 从力学和仿生学角度，对颅骨的强度和刚度做了讨论。

sentences.english: The arrangement of the ribs has important effects on the rigidity of molded plastic part too.
sentences.chinese: 加强筋的布置对注塑件的刚度也有重要影响。

sentences.english: Direction of manual force applied during assessment of stiffness in the lumbosacral spine.
sentences.chinese: 力方向的过程中应用刚度评估手册在腰骶脊柱。

sentences.english: The stiffness matrix about the three-dimension space connecting bar is derived.
sentences.chinese: 并从理论上推导出了空间杆单元的刚度矩阵。

sentences.english: The influence of variation of stiffness and damping on vehicle ride performance is analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了刚度和阻尼的变化对车辆平顺性的影响。

sentences.english: Apart from stiffness, graphene is possibly better known as a potential silicon replacement.
sentences.chinese: 除了刚度，石墨烯更著名的是其有可能替代硅。

sentences.english: The nonlinear stiffness of the insulating system and the best frequency ratio are put forth.
sentences.chinese: 采用非线性刚度为主的隔振系统，确定了最佳频率比。

sentences.english: The radial stiffness of magnetic bearings composed of only two permanent magnet rings is limited.
sentences.chinese: 由双磁环组成的永磁磁悬浮轴承的径向刚度很有限。

sentences.english: The results show that the stress intensity and stiffness are enough.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，刚架结构的强度和刚度是足够的。

sentences.english: In this paper, the author presented a method for defining the shock siffiness of vibration isolators .
sentences.chinese: 提出一个用试验方法确定隔振器冲击刚度的方法。

definition: to support/to bear the weight of (a building)
